channel.title: Custom title (Matrix)
channel.description: Hello, i hate to keep posting these help things but i realy want to know, so in the matrix release there is a custom title "666"that makes your title phantom, well i tried adding another one under it and it worked fine but when you login it crashes, is ther e somewhere else that i need to add this for it to work? because i tryed changing the one that was already in there from 666 to 900 and it dident work only the 666 works, i've searched throughout the source and client and cant find anywhere that would have this..:fp:

item.title: Custom title (Matrix)
item.dc:creator: @Lucas7 Lucas7
item.description:
@Lucas7 wrote:

there is a SUPER easy way to add custom titles but it usually crashes your friends list/PMing System. PM me if you want it.

Oh and this is completely server sided unlike alot of other tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom title (Matrix)
item.dc:creator: @Citellum Citellum
item.description:
@Citellum wrote:

I forget how but it has to be packed it some shit.

Read full topic
